trans-unit.source: Pytest requires old version of more-itertools. That happens.

trans-unit.source: All-in-one-solution. DepHell can manage dependencies, virtual environments, tests, CLI tools, packages, generate configs, show licenses for dependencies, assist with security audits, get download statistics from PyPI, search packages and much more.
trans-unit.target: 多合一解决方案。DepHell可以管理依赖关系，虚拟环境，测试，CLI工具，程序包，生成配置，显示依赖关系许可证，协助进行安全审核，从PyPI获取下载统计信息，搜索程序包等等。

trans-unit.source: Asyncio based. DepHell doesn't support Python 2.7, and that allows us to use modern features to make network and filesystem requests as fast as possible.
trans-unit.target: 基于Asyncio。DepHell不支持Python 2.7，这使我们能够使用现代功能来尽可能快地提出网络和文件系统请求。

trans-unit.source: DepHell doesn't try to replace your favorite tools. If you use poetry, you have to use poetry's file formats and commands. However, DepHell can be combined with any other tool or can even combine all these tools together by converting formats. You can use DepHell, poetry, and pip all at the same time.
trans-unit.target: DepHell不会尝试更换您喜欢的工具。如果使用诗歌，则必须使用诗歌的文件格式和命令。但是，DepHell可以与任何其他工具组合，甚至可以通过转换格式将所有这些工具组合在一起。您可以同时使用DepHell，诗歌和pip。

trans-unit.source: DepHell -- project management for Python.
trans-unit.target: DepHell -Python的项目管理。

trans-unit.source: Developer friendly. We aren't going to place all of our modules into _internal. Also, DepHell has a large ecosystem with separated libraries so you can use only the parts of DepHell that you need.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员友好。我们不会将所有模块都放入 _internal 。此外，DepHell具有一个庞大的生态系统，具有独立的库，因此您只能使用DepHell所需的部分。

trans-unit.source: Easily extendable. DepHell has strong modularity and can be easily extended with new formats and commands.
trans-unit.target: 容易扩展。DepHell具有强大的模块化功能，可以轻松地通过新格式和命令进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: Format agnostic. You can use DepHell with your favorite format: setup.py, requirements.txt, Pipfile, poetry. DepHell supports them all and much more.
trans-unit.target: 格式不可知。您可以将DepHell与您喜欢的格式一起使用：setup.py，requirements.txt，Pipfile，诗歌。DepHell为他们提供了更多支持。

trans-unit.source: Multiple environments. You can have as many environments for project as you want. Separate sphinx dependencies from your main and dev environment. Other tools like pipenv and poetry don't support this.
trans-unit.target: 多种环境。您可以根据需要为项目提供多个环境。将狮身人面像依赖项与您的主要和开发环境分开。Pipenv和诗歌等其他工具不支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: Smart dependency resolution. Sometimes pip and pipenv fail to lock your dependencies. Try to execute pipenv install oslo.utils==1.4.0. Pipenv can't handle it, but DepHell can: dephell deps add --from=Pipfile oslo.utils==1.4.0 to add new dependency and dephell deps convert --from=Pipfile --to=Pipfile.lock to lock it.
trans-unit.target: 智能依赖性解析。有时pip和pipenv无法锁定您的依赖项。尝试执行 pipenv install oslo.utils==1.4.0 。Pipenv无法处理它，但DepHell可以： dephell deps add --from=Pipfile oslo.utils==1.4.0 以添加新的依赖项，而 dephell deps convert --from=Pipfile --to=Pipfile.lock 可以将其锁定。

trans-unit.source: Use your favorite tool on any project. Want to install a poetry based project, but don't like poetry? Just tell DepHell to convert the project's meta information into a setup.py and install it with pip. Or directly work with the project from DepHell, because DepHell can do everything that you usually want to do with packages.
trans-unit.target: 在任何项目上使用您喜欢的工具。是否想安装基于诗歌的项目，但不喜欢诗歌？只需告诉DepHell将项目的元信息转换为setup.py并使用pip进行安装即可。或直接与DepHell的项目一起工作，因为DepHell可以完成您通常要使用软件包进行的所有操作。

trans-unit.source: Afer that our dev-dependencies looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 因此,我们的开发依赖关系是这样的。

trans-unit.source: And then build packages:
trans-unit.target: 然后建立包。

trans-unit.source: Anything what you want. If it is a new feature, please, open an issue before writing the code.
trans-unit.target: 任何你想要的东西。如果是新功能,请在写代码之前,先开一个问题。

trans-unit.source: Archives:
trans-unit.target: 档案。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility
trans-unit.target: 兼容性

trans-unit.source: DepHell is tested on Linux and Mac OS X with Python 3.5, 3.6, 3.7. And one of the coolest things is that DepHell is run by DepHell on Travis CI.
trans-unit.target: DepHell在Linux和Mac OS X上用Python 3.5、3.6、3.7进行测试。而最酷的一点是,DepHell是由DepHell在Travis CI上运行的。

trans-unit.source: DepHell works on Windows but has no CI to keep in working yet.
trans-unit.target: DepHell在Windows上工作,但还没有CI来保持工作。

trans-unit.source: Dependency resolution for Python
trans-unit.target: Python的依赖性解析

trans-unit.source: Document new things.
trans-unit.target: 记录新事物。

trans-unit.target: 环境;

trans-unit.target: 最终我们会有更多的依赖关系。让我们看看我们现在有多少个。

trans-unit.target: 特点:

trans-unit.target: 修正语法和错别字。

trans-unit.source: Follow @PythonDepHell on Twitter to get updates about new features and releases.
trans-unit.target: 在Twitter上关注@PythonDepHell，以获取有关新功能和版本的更新。

trans-unit.source: Generate .editorconfig, LICENSE, AUTHORS, .travis.yml.
trans-unit.target: 生成.editorconfig，许可证，作者，.travis.yml。

trans-unit.source: Hm...Is it as many as it seems? Let's look at their size.
trans-unit.target: 哼......有看起来那么多吗?让我们看看他们的规模。

trans-unit.source: How can I help
trans-unit.target: 我能帮上什么忙?

trans-unit.source: If our tests and dependencies are OK, it's time to deploy. First of all, increment the project version:
trans-unit.target: 如果我们的测试和依赖关系都没有问题,就可以进行部署了。首先,增加项目版本。

trans-unit.source: It will make setup.py and README.rst from pyproject.toml and README.md.
trans-unit.target: 它将从pyproject.toml和README.md制作setup.py和README.rst。

trans-unit.source: Let's get sampleproject and make it better.
trans-unit.target: 让我们获取sampleproject并将其改进。

trans-unit.source: Make READMEs more nice and friendly.
trans-unit.target: 让READMEs变得更加美好和友好。

trans-unit.source: Manage dependencies: convert between formats, instаll, lock, add new, resolve conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 管理依赖项：在格式之间转换，安装，锁定，添加新内容，解决冲突。

trans-unit.source: Manage packages: install, list, search on PyPI.
trans-unit.target: 管理软件包：在PyPI上安装，列出，搜索。

trans-unit.source: Manage virtual environments: create, remove, inspect, run shell, run commands inside.
trans-unit.target: 管理虚拟环境：创建，删除，检查，运行shell，在其中运行命令。

trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以调用DepHell命令，而无需显式指定 from 和 to ：

trans-unit.source: Our users probably have not installed poetry, but they are likely to have pip and can install files from setup.py. Let's make it easier to generate setup.py from our pyproject.toml. Also, it points to DepHell as your default dependencies file. Add the following lines in the pyproject.toml:

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: View issues with the help wanted label to find things that you can fix.
trans-unit.target: 使用帮助标签查看问题，以查找可以解决的问题。

trans-unit.source: We can now activate the virtual environment for our project and run any commands inside:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以激活我们项目的虚拟环境,并在里面运行任何命令。

trans-unit.source: Why it is better than all other tools:
trans-unit.target: 为什么它比其他所有工具都好。

trans-unit.source: You can see a full, real-world example of a config in DepHell's own pyproject.toml.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在DepHell自己的pyproject.toml中看到配置的完整示例。
